Author: Katia_Earley

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,234Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 207

entry.title: Life on the Other Side
entry.summary:
Author: Akio_O

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,895Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 208

Summary: For Timothy Drake, obsession is far worse than compulsion.Compulsivity is action. Action can be taken and completed at any time, it’s mindless. It’s repetitive movement, expected and anticipated more often than not.Obsession is far worse. Obsession plagues the mind and overtakes rationality. It spins spiderwebs in the brain and warps your very being. It can spawn from the simplest thing and then spiral into an all encompassing essentiality.TLDR; Tim needs to know everything, Damian is hard to know and the world makes it impossible. Plus a stroll on the darker side of Gotham!

entry.summary:
Author: robinkink

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,774Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 112

Author: RinRin222

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,827Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 49

Summary: All it takes to crumble Tim’s relationship with the Wayne’s, specifically Bruce, is for an infatuation drug to be administered. Everything tumbles down after that, and he’s left alone to try to build it all back up. Only… Maybe he’s not as alone as he thinks, in those feelings or that building.
